title: Freddy Fazbear's Pizzaria Simulator
notes: The game seems to play normally, but where I'm guessing there should be sound, there is none.

title: Freddy Fazbear's Pizzeria Simulator
notes: It works, but it starts full-screen and has no way to quit it. I had to alt+tab into a terminal to kill it.

title: Freddy Fazbear's Pizzeria Simulator
notes: It works very well, I didn't see any graphical or sound issues and the game plays as it should
Works flawlessly, with sound and everything else.
title: Freddy Fazbear's Pizzeria Simulator

notes: The cut-scenes and animatronic interrogations do not work.  Some of the sounds do not play, tutorial phone calls especially. Other than that the game runs well. If you knew what you were doing this could be playable, but if the animatronic collection is broken you won't be able to fully complete the game.
title: Freddy Fazbear's Pizzeria Simulator
